product_name: Tiger Tail USA Knotty Tiger Knot Buster Muscle Massager
long_description: Work out trigger points and sore muscles with the hand-held Knotty Tiger Knot Buster Muscle massager from Tiger Tails USA. Hard, firm and smooth surface relieves trigger points and muscle tension while easily sliding over clothing. Nonslip grip for secure, controlled movements of massager. Portable size makes it perfect for at home and on-the-road use.
short_description: Work out trigger points and sore muscles with the hand-held Knotty Tiger Knot Buster Muscle massager from Tiger Tails USA.
